snippet.title: 8  Reducing Technical Debt While Keeping Systems Running
snippet.description:
🧮 Reducing Technical Debt While Keeping Systems Running  
🎥 Episode 8 of 10 — Now Streaming

Technical debt:  
It’s invisible… until it derails your velocity, burns out your team, and slows every initiative to a crawl.

But here’s the kicker — you can’t just stop everything and fix it.  
🛑 Business must keep running.  
🔧 Systems must stay online.  
📈 Deadlines don’t wait.

So… how do CTOs pay off tech debt *without* halting progress?

🎯 In this must-watch 2-minute video:
⚙️ We unpack the true cost of accumulated technical debt  
🧠 Show why “big bang” cleanups rarely work  
🚀 Reveal how NKD Agility helps CTOs **reduce technical debt gradually—without disruption**

Using DevOps practices, refactoring roadmaps, and legacy-aware modernization, we help you chip away at the backlog while delivering business value.

💡 It’s not about stopping the train. It’s about fixing the tracks while you’re moving.

👇 Tap to watch now. Follow for the full 10-part series.  Visit https://nkdagility.com/capabilities/azure-devops-migration-services/ if you need help with #azuredevops or #devopsmigration

#CTO #TechnicalDebt #LegacySystems #DevOps #EngineeringExcellence #ModernizationStrategy #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #AgileDelivery
